description: From cat +â€Ž fight. So named because, like cats, scratching is a common defensive tactic among women, as opposed to a fistfight between men.

examples: The caterwauling from the catfight in the back yard was awful; I couldn't get to sleep until it was over.

entries.meaning: (slang) A fight or bickering between women.
examples: Nancy and Sheila got into a catfight when Nancy's boyfriend cheated on her with Sheila.
